column3:
“I got this strain from ECC in central CA. SB to be exact.  I liked it.  Very woodsy, earthy bouquet.  Lighter green in color than expected but had yellow-ish hairs.  The combination of the two colors play off each other to give off a 'glowing neon' look.  Great bag appeal.

I'd have to say the only remarkable characteristic of this flower was its appearance. Other than that, I feel it's a middle of the road strain.  ...”
“For a hybrid, this is a face melter! Definitely becomes sedative after prolonged use.”
“Love this strand when I need a nap after school.”

“This one had me at 'Hello'.

The nose is intriguing - a hint of fuel but mostly toast and a spice you can't quite put a name to but you know it.  The smoke is dense but even.  And when the head high comes on -- it's a treat.  Starts as a lovely, Peaceful feeling of Calm that seems to ask 'Where ya want to go?'  One could answer, The couch
column4: dude".  To which the Peaceful Calm would say
column5: "Let's go become one with the c...”"

column3: “very nice strain....I find it to be a functional indica...definitely nice for sleep if used in excess...small amounts promote deep, positive thoughts...love it!”

“This stuff is amazing. I've had lower back pain for years, been on flexeril, did phisical therapy which helped but the pain was still there. within 45 min of smoking this the pain was gone. Also elevated my mood and helped with my anxiety. Great for socializing and not forgetting where your going half way through a sentence. All around this is definitely something I'll be smoking for a while.”
“This is my new favorite it hits very hard if rolled in a backwood i honestly hate strains that are charged 15 a g but this one is the first i will give five stars”

“Ho Baaa! Dis bugga is mean kine Pakalolo! Got all da goo from da Gorilla Glue #4 with a sweet tropical finger lickin kick and massive yield boost from da Kona Gold. Hawaiian sativa influence plus all the glue and goo...shootz we go cuz!”

“Ho Baaa! Dis bugga is mean kine Pakalolo! Got all da goo from da Gorilla Glue #4 with a sweet tropical finger lickin kick and massive yield boost from da Kona Gold. Hawaiian sativa influence plus all the glue and goo...shootz we go cuz!”
“very strong, but a very great high.”
“It’s a good strain it low key makes me horny though”

“I got this strain as a recommendation from a budtender at MMMP Collective in Michigan. The first time I tried it, I rolled it in a joint and smoked half that night. It took about 15 minutes for the effects to kick in, but it was gentle. The tension in my body melted away and before long the night just slipped by. I felt very calm and comfortable falling asleep. 

I used this again during the day time to see how it fe...”
“Dodgy stuff lads”
“pungent great, long lasting and sedative. That's that gas”
“This strain had a lemon zest up front and a nice peppercorn finish. The body high was long lasting and is great for insomnia.”

“This strain is straight fire 🔥 I picked this up because 1 I haven't heard of this strain yet, and 2 I am a huge fan of the GG#4. So when I smoked it, it felt as if Godzilla had kicked me in the chest, and then proceeded to sit on me while I was down. This strain is now my personal favorite strain.”

“Boosted my creativity and art-ingesting properties. Loved listening to music and seeing shows and movies after smoking this. Became moderately paranoid most times, though. Mine was called Gorilla Glue which may be a little different from Godzilla Glue, but this was the closest name listed on Leafly. 8/10”
“love it”
“Got some of the best nights sleep I’ve ever had my life, use this to help myself over come and stop my prescription medication for pain. Very thankful for this one!”
“Smelled & tasted GREAT. Very pungent. Nice high - head & body. Doesn’t make you sleepy & doesn’t give you an energy boost, just relaxation.”
“Best strain I've smoked! everything from the looks, smell, and smoke”

“Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank proudly presents: 


~ Godzilla Glue #44 ~

(Kona Gold x Herban Tribe GG#4)


Kona Gold dakine fearsome & ferocious Father of Godzilla Glue #44, is a gigantic Hawaiian Sativa of legendary proportions ~ Kona Gold is livin so large in fact that Green Harvest helicopters had no problem spotting huge Hawaiian Pakalōlō plants from outer space and nearly eradicated every plant...Mah...”
